title: Drawing, "Urn in front of a niche", ca. 1775
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457e)
provenance: Ex collection: Giovanni Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: With a cover above the projecting rim.  The lower part of the body is fluted.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Urn in front of a niche", ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Black crayon on paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7326.
